dict.acceptation: 鸟，禽；<俚>少女，姑娘，人，家伙，东西；<口>飞机，火箭，导弹；
观察和辨认鸟；捕鸟，打鸟；

sent.orig: Attitude, chemistry and professionalism were recurring themes throughout Bird's lengthy question-and-answer session.
sent.trans: 态度，化合作用和职业性是bird整个新闻发布会得主题。

sent.orig: Bird expressed particular frustration with Stephen Jackson's on-court demeanor.
sent.trans: Bird对于SJ表达明显的失望，尤其是他的场上行为。

sent.orig: The end user is like NEC, BIRD and HUAWEI.
sent.trans: 最终客户有NEC,BIRD,HUAWEI 手机厂家。

sent.orig: Maybe I was a bird in another life. If you're a bird, I'm a bird.
sent.trans: 我的前世也许是只鸟。—如果你是一只鸟，那我也是一只鸟。出自电影《手札情缘》。

sent.orig: Yet, bird, O my bird, listen to me, do not close your wings.
sent.trans: 但是，鸟儿，我的鸟儿，听我的话，不要垂翅吧。
